Mad Ads

A fun and competitive event where teams create quirky, humorous advertisements for fictional products or services.

About the Event

  • Mad Ads is a fun and competitive event where teams create quirky, humorous advertisements for fictional products or services, showcasing their creativity and improvisational skills.
  • Participants are judged on originality, presentation, humor, and teamwork as they pitch their unique ad concepts.
  • This event aims to entertain and engage audiences, bringing out the best in on-the-spot marketing and creativity.

Event Details

  • Introduction and Theme Reveal: Teams will randomly pick their topics from a pool of options provided.
  • Preparation Time (1 hour): Teams are given time to brainstorm and develop their ad concept, slogans, taglines, and roles within their team.
  • Presentation Round (3-5 minutes per team): Each team presents their advertisement, using humor and creativity to pitch their fictional product or service. Judges score based on creativity, presentation, humor, relevance, and teamwork.

Rules & Regulations

  • Time allowed is 3 â€“ 5 minutes per team.
  • Maximum number of participants per team can be 3 to 4.
  • The topic for the performance will be given by the event coordinators 1 hour before the commencement of the event.
  • Any form of bias against caste, creed, community, or religion is not tolerated.
  • Each college is permitted a maximum of two teams for participation in the Mad Ads event.

Judging Criteria

  • Creativity and Originality
  • Presentation and Delivery
  • Humor and Entertainment Value
  • Content and Relevance & Team Coordination
